ci_support_linux_64_python3.10.____cpyth:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
fortran_compiler:
- gfortran
fortran_compiler_version:
- '14'
numpy:
- '2'
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
pybind11_abi:
- '4'
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - c_compiler_version
  - cxx_compiler_version
  - fortran_compiler_version

about.description: This project aims at proving tools (functions, classes, bindings, etc…) to handle behaviours written using MFront generic interface
This project aims at proving tools (functions, classes, bindings, etc…) to handle behaviours written using MFront generic interface

name: mgis

about.description: This project aims at proving tools (functions, classes, bindings, etc…) to handle behaviours written using MFront generic interface
This project aims at proving tools (functions, classes, bindings, etc…) to handle behaviours written using MFront generic interface

raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  name: mgis
  version: "3.1"

package:
  name: ${{ name|lower }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  - url: https://github.com/thelfer/MFrontGenericInterfaceSupport/archive/refs/tags/MFrontGenericInterfaceSupport-${{ version }}.tar.gz
    sha256: 61afae1a367dbb150b24ca85f042efb15a77184a54a746f11c08d9b7cb9e94f3
    patches:
      - patches/site_packages_override_on_windows.patch

build:
  number: 0
  prefix_detection:
    ignore_binary_files: true

requirements:
  build:
    - ${{ compiler('c') }}
    - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
    - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - ${{ compiler('fortran') }}
    - cmake >=3.26.4
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then:
        - python
        - cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
        - numpy
        - mfront
        - pybind11
    - if: win
      then:
        - ninja
        - m2-tar
        - m2-gzip
        - m2-patch
      else:
        - autoconf
        - make
  host:
    - python
    - numpy
    - pybind11
    - mfront
  run:
    - python
  run_exports:
    - ${{ pin_subpackage('mgis', upper_bound='x.x.x') }}

tests:
  - python:
      imports:
        - mgis
  - requirements:
      run:
        - pip
    script:
      - pip check
      - if: linux
        then:
          - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libMFrontGenericInterface.so
      - if: osx
        then:
          - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libMFrontGenericInterface.dylib
      - if: not win
        then:
          - test -f $PREFIX/include/MGIS/Config.hxx
          - test -f $PREFIX/share/mgis/cmake/MFrontGenericInterfaceConfig.cmake

about:
  license: LGPL-3.0-or-later AND CECILL-C
  license_file:
    - LGPL-3.0.txt
    - CeCILL-C_V1-en.txt
    - CeCILL-C_V1-fr.txt
  summary: MGIS - MFrontGenericInterfaceSupport
  description: |
    This project aims at proving tools (functions, classes, bindings, etc…) to handle behaviours written using MFront generic interface
  homepage: https://thelfer.github.io/mgis/web/index.html
  documentation: https://github.com/thelfer/MFrontGenericInterfaceSupport

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - Krande
    - ldallolio

about.description: This project aims at proving tools (functions, classes, bindings, etc…) to handle behaviours written using MFront generic interface
